tool_description:
Do you need to screen-scrape Javascript Websites? 

PhantomJs.Cloud is 
- A web-browser hosted as a service, using Chrome WebKit to render your javascript heavy webpages as HTML, JPEG, PDF, or JSON.
- A Cloud of PhantomJS instances to process more than 100 pages per second.
- A REST API allowing you to request and obtain your pages.
- A Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) with free plans, and paid plans starting at $1 for 5,000 pages.
(BitCoin and Free plan available)
name: PhantomJs.Cloud - Web Browser and Webpage processing as a Service
title: PhantomJs.Cloud - Web Browser and Webpage processing as a Service
tool_name: PhantomJs.Cloud - Web Browser and Webpage processing as a Service

api_list.name: Any WebPage to JPEG
api_list.description: Take a screen-shot of any page

required_parameters.name: targetUrl
required_parameters.description: the url you wish to render. 	Client-side and server-side redirects will be respected. 	Set the 'isDebug' and output as JSON to view redirect and resource load information.

required_parameters.name: loadImages
required_parameters.description: you should only set this to TRUE if rendering jpeg (where the visuals matter), 	otherwise you will need to wait for extra useless data default=false

required_parameters.name: resourceUrlBlacklist
required_parameters.description: regex.  default value of [".*.css.*"] causes rendering issues so leave this at empty "[]"

optional_parameters.name: viewportSize
optional_parameters.description: [OPTIONAL ADVANCED FEATURE]: Set the size of the output screenshot (impact rendering on pages with responsive layouts)

api_list.name: Any AJAX WebPage to HTML
api_list.description: Basic Example of the PhantomJsCloud.com features.

required_parameters.name: targetUrl
required_parameters.description: the url you wish to render. 	Client-side and server-side redirects will be respected. 	Set the 'isDebug' and output as JSON to view redirect and resource load information.

api_list.name: Pinterest to JSON (Injected Scripts)
api_list.description: Extract ALL the data from ANY Pinterest page.  This is an example of the 'pageRequest.injectedScripts' feature.

optional_parameters.name: viewportSize
optional_parameters.description: [OPTIONAL ADVANCED FEATURE]: Grab more results.  Because Pinterest uses AJAX "infinte-scrolling", set this to something with a large height. (see example)

api_list.name: Any WebPage to PDF
api_list.description: Archive a copy of the page as PDF (includes clickable hyperlinks)

required_parameters.name: targetUrl
required_parameters.description: the url you wish to render. 	Client-side and server-side redirects will be respected. 	Set the 'isDebug' and output as JSON to view redirect and resource load information.

required_parameters.name: loadImages
required_parameters.description: you should only set this to TRUE if rendering jpeg (where the visuals matter), 	otherwise you will need to wait for extra useless data default=false
